markdownRemark.html:
Dear accepted paper authors,

Congratulations!

We, the organizer of the OWC, would like to express sincere welcome to you and look forward to seeing you all in Taiwan, whether online or in person.

For uploading your final paper, please follow the instruction below. https://ieeeexpressconferencepublishing.ieee.org/confid/glo20ws/

Note that the conference ID is glo20ws, not glo20.

See you in Taiwan.

IMPORTANT DATES
Paper submission: 14 August 2020
Notification of acceptance: 15 September 2020
Final papers submission: 1 October 2020
